headline.main: Cautious King Took Risks In Straddling Two Worlds

abstract: Obituary of Jordan's King Hussein, who died at age 63; cites his twin legacies of peace with neighbors, including Israel, and fairly tolerant, stable society at home; chronology of events in Hussein's life; map; photos (L)
snippet: King Hussein of Jordan, who died yesterday at 63, successfully straddled two worlds in more than four tumultuous decades on the throne.     Cautious by instinct and habit, King Hussein took pride in his Western impulses and his Arab roots, though ...

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: HUSSEIN I, KING OF HASHEMITE JORDAN
